Hotel.name: Neya Lisboa Eco Hotel (Formerly Neya Lisboa Hotel)

Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Lisbon with a stay at Neya Lisboa Hotel, steps from Hospital Dona Estefania and close to Castle of Sao Jorge. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Atrium Saldanha and Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 76 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a health club or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

You'll be centrally located in Lisbon with a stay at Neya Lisboa Hotel, steps from Hospital Dona Estefania and close to Castle of Sao Jorge. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Atrium Saldanha and Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hospital Dona Estefania - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Atrium Saldanha - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Saldanha Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Instituto Superior Tecnico - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Marques de Pombal Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Edward VII Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Jose Tomas de Sousa Martins Monument - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Medeiros e Almeida Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Torel Garden - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Cinemateca Portuguesa Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Culturgest - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Center for Modern Art - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Neya Lisboa Hotel is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Room 1
From 2019-03-12 To 2030-12-31
City Tax
A city tax of EUR 2 per person per night is not included in the total price for hotels in Lisbon and should be paid on site. This tax is charged to guests aged 13 and older. It is subject to a maximum of 7 Nights.

Pax name changes are not allowed.

Room 1
From 2019-03-12 To 2030-12-31
City Tax
A city tax of EUR 2 per person per night is not included in the total price for hotels in Lisbon and should be paid on site. This tax is charged to guests aged 13 and older. It is subject to a maximum of 7 Nights.

Pax name changes are not allowed.

Room 1
City Tax: Lisbon hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.
Note: *There is a city tax payable by the guest directly at the hotel.
